issue.title: [CF 1148] Timer DogTag last time since proc/buff
issue.body:
Is there a DogTag to add as text when that proc last time happend ? i would like to add that on rppm trinkets.


> Posted by CurseForge user Drozo_Qoocla | Imported from CurseForge issue #1148 | Raw

comments.body:
Use a combat event icon to start a TMW notification timer, and use the existing dog tag to reference that timer.

Edited Aug 10, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
